import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import HeaderComponent from "./HeaderComponent"; import { userDetailsUpdateAction } from '../Redux/Actions/Actions' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; function UserProfileController(props) { const [userDetails, setUserDetails] = useState(null); const [userFormData, setUserFormData] = useState(); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { if (props.userDetails) { setUserDetails(props.userDetails); setUserFormData(props.userDetails); } else if (localStorage.getItem('UserDetails') && localStorage.getItem('UserDetails') != '') { setUserDetails(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('UserDetails'))); setUserFormData(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('UserDetails'))); } else { navigate('/'); } }, [props.userDetails]) const onFormUpdate = (event) => { setUserFormData({ ...userFormData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); } const onSaveForm = () => { console.log("userFormData", userFormData); props.onUserDetailsUpdateAction(userFormData); } return ( <>
(onSaveForm())} >

State

) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { userDetails: state.userDetails.userDetails, } } const mapDispatchtoProps = { onUserDetailsUpdateAction: (id, details) => userDetailsUpdateAction(id, details), } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchtoProps)(UserProfileController)
